name: Don't touch 'em
description:
Year 2769.

You're an one-eyed space pirate. In your journey through the vast region of space,
you encountered an alien planet. Upon exploring the planet your crew came
in contact with an unknown species. They bought it back to the ship. 

Spoiler! They shouldn't have touched it!

Unfortunately, this species feeds only on people and leaves behind only the eyes
of its victims. Now you are a sentient eye floating through space and dodging other
dangerous aliens.

It's the last chance for your survival!

- This game is made for Weekly Game Jam (Week 107)
- Theme: Don't Touch It!
